messages.subject: Off Topic- A way to save money if anybody pays by the email
messages.msgSnippet: Hi to everyone, I just had a thought about the person who mentioned that they pay by the email. Maybe you ve thought of this already, but maybe you could
messages.messageBody:
Hi to everyone,

I just had a thought about the person who mentioned that they pay by
the email. Maybe you've thought of this already, but maybe you could
switch to "no mail" in your group preference, and then just come to the
group's messages page to read all the new messages for free whenever
you want. That's how I do it because it's so much faster to scan the
topic lines, or read every message if you have the time. You don't have
to wait for digests, and you can see the threads more clearly also.

Just an idea. Back to enjoying the exchange of so many ideas from lurk
for awhile.

peace be with you
Makana
